2086790.name: This Is Land of Mysterious
2086790.description:
Is Land of Mysterious is a singleplayer game
about surviving on the mysterious island.

You lost control from your plane and landed on the mysterious island.
Look like you're not alone in the island. Try to survive and leave island.



It is a unique combination of the popular survive mechanic
with mysterious puzzle and philosophy traditions.
Game with a Spirit of Alternative history and various mythology.

The core gameplay is based around survival with puzzles and problem solving.
The player who solved more puzzles and find more secrets gets more trophy.
Such as achievements, rating, chests with equipment etc.
Find a way to leave the island!

  • Resources and artifacts

    Gather resources and artifacts. Craft tools, equipment, weapons and environment.

  • Build system

    Wake up yourself architect. Use the right resources and translate your fantasies.
    There's a place on the island where your buildings are almost safe.

  • Puzzles

    Open up the new corners of the island. Carry out different tasks and take your awards.
    Many different regions of the island. Dangerous, amazing and interesting.
    Solve puzzles and take your awards.

  • Crafting

    A system of craft of various items from collected and recovered resources. Tools, weapons, household items.
